basics.name: Andrew Weisbeck
basics.label: Freelance Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: With over 3 years of experience as a freelance developer, I am driven by a continual love of learning and innovation. My career is marked by efforts to develop web-based applications and improve product quality through code optimization and proactive problem-solving.

work.name: Tar Heel Dev Studio
work.summary: Develop, test, and deploy web applications for new clients. Manage content and marketing for small business clients. Design user interfaces, websites, and interactive components that improve user experience.
highlights: Created my own freelance studio and manage the day-to-day operations
responsibilities: Deployed 10 full-stack web applications using MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js.
Improved web app performance by 20% using Sentry and Open Replay for performance analysis.
Integrated third-party APIs to extend app functionality, enhancing user satisfaction scores by 35%.
Streamlined deployment process through Docker containerization, shortening release cycles by 50%.
Facilitated community feature adoption by contributing to open-source repositories, benefiting 5 projects.
achievements: Help clients double the traffic to their website with improved website performance and effective storytelling.

work.name: Iron Range Cyber, formerly CyberOpz
work.summary: Responsible for monitoring endpoints, reporting any security incidents to senior SOC analysts, and investigating cyber forensics of any hacking attempt or breach of client assets.
highlights: Contributed to streamlining processes for a startup cyber security company. Reduced critical client security incidents 100% by catching any breaches of security early enough to prevent loss of assets and criticial information.
responsibilities:
Improved incident response rate by 15% by coordinating with SOC managers
and analyzing security events.
Managed over 100 security assessments using Nessus, Wireshark, and Metasploit tools.
Enhanced system security by evaluating and improving authentication methods by 20%.
Informed cyber defenders, ensuring threat awareness for 50 potential impacts.
Influenced cyber strategy for 5 clients by presenting clear technical solutions.
Reduced overall incident response time by 30%, optimizing threat detection processes using Malwarebytes, Witfoo, and IRIS.
achievements: Learned cybersecurity and was capable of all job functions within the first month of being hired.

work.name: WeisMind Studio
work.summary: Created multiple blogs and completed freelance writing assignments for over 50 clients.

volunteer.summary: Helped organize coding workshops and mentored new members.
highlights: Write technical tutorials about web development and share with an audience of over 1,000 web developers each week.

courses: MIS151 - Management of Information Systems and Supply Chain

projects.name: My Resume Site
projects.description: A resume website to showcase my projects and skills.
highlights: Built with Astro and Tailwind CSS
Includes printable resume, keyboard commands, experience and skills section, and projects section.

projects.name: GeauxWeisbeck4.dev
projects.description: A personal portfolio website and dev journal for sharing my projects and a place where I can share developer resources and write about what I'm learning.
highlights: Built with React, Svelte, Astro, PostgreSQL, Strapi CMS, and Tailwind CSS
Third version of this website I've developed

projects.name: HuskerJS College Football Blog
projects.description: A full-stack college football blog that I created with Django.
highlights: Built with Django, PostgreSQL, and Next.js

projects.name: URL Shortener API
projects.description: A URL shortener API created with FastAPI.
highlights: Admin can track clicks with their secret key
